cluedo

Class Cluedo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cluedo.Cluedo

  • public class Cluedo
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing the main game logic including setting up the game and then playing the game.
    Author:
    Aden Kenny and Simon Pope.

    • Method Detail

      • tokensSetup

        private void tokensSetup()
        Setup the character and weapons tokens.

      • doTurn

        private void doTurn(Player p)
        A method doing a player's turn. Is passed a player then does their dice roll, moving and if applicable, it does their suggestions.
        Parameters:
        p - The player who's turn will be completed.

      • accusation

        private Triplet accusation(java.util.Scanner in)
        Creates an accusation based on the user's input. Makes sure inputs are valid i.e. when prompted for the weapon, that the input actually corresponds a weapon.
        Parameters:
        in - The scanner which input will be read from (Probably System.in).
        Returns:
        a Triplet with the user input values.

      • suggestion

        private Triplet suggestion(java.util.Scanner in,
                           Player p)
        Creates a triplet based on the player's guess. A player is required to be passed as the room in the triplet is based on the player's current location.
        Parameters:
        in - The scanner passed along, should be System.in()
        p - The player who's guessing.
        Returns:
        A triplet based on the info from the scanner.

      • putCards

        private void putCards()
        After the murder details have been done this puts all the cards into one set ready to be dealt amongst the players.

      • dealHands

        private void dealHands()
        Deals the remaining cards to the hands of the players in the game. Each player will receive (18 / n) cards where n is the number of players.

      • doStartRolls

        private Player doStartRolls(java.util.List<Player> temp)
        Returns the player with the highest roll to see who starts.
        Parameters:
        temp - List of players we're iterating through.
        Returns:
        Player with the highest roll.

      • setupPlayer

        private Player setupPlayer(int playerNumb)
        Sets up a human player and adds it to the set of players to be passed to the board when the game is setup.
        Parameters:
        playerNumb - The number of the player to be setup.
        Returns:
        newPlayer A setup player that will be added to the set of players in the game.

      • rollDice

        public static int rollDice()
        Gets a random number between 1 and 12 representing a dice roll for moving around the board.
        Returns:
        An int between 1 and 12.

      • rollDice6

        public static int rollDice6()
        Gets a random number between 1 and 6 representing a dice roll for moving around the board.
        Returns:
        An int between 1 and 6.

      • createCharStrings

        private void createCharStrings()
        Puts the list of playable characters in a set and returns them. For purposes of selecting characters.

      • createCharacters

        private void createCharacters()
        Creates cards based on the characters and adds them to a set.

      • createWeapons

        private void createWeapons()
        Creates cards based on the weapons and adds them to a set.

      • createRooms

        private void createRooms()
        Creates cards based on the rooms and adds them to a set.

      • doMurder

        private void doMurder()
        Picks a random weapon, person, and room into a triplet. These are the murder details that have to be guessed.

      • runGame

        private void runGame()
        Does the game logic.

      • setupPlayers

        private void setupPlayers()

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
